gist.headline: Painting your next talk
gist.blurb: Meet SlidePainter, a new community app that turns your ideas into illustrated presentation slides. Generate, arrange, and export to PDF in a snap.
gist.summary: Introduced SlidePainter, a new AI-powered application for generating and managing presentation slides with PDF export and markdown configuration support.
gist.impact: Users can now rapidly prototype and export illustrated slide decks using AI generation directly within the platform.
gist.visual_concept: The Pollinations bee as a presenter/artist. Symbols: Projector screen, slides, paintbrush, pointer stick. The bee is showcasing a generated image on a retro screen.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot wearing a tiny tweed jacket and holding a pointer stick in front of a glowing pixelated projector screen. The screen displays a colorful landscape image. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and lavender gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic like Stardew Valley. Text in pixel font on a slide: 'SLIDE 1'. Cozy pixel art, 8-bit aesthetic, soft pastel gradients, warm lighting, retro gaming vibes.
